long_description: Light as a butterfly and a little bit sassy, the women's Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses are full of fun for all your outdoor exploits this summer. Polarized polycarbonate injection-molded lenses cut glare and offer 100% protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Tortoise frames have brown polarized lenses; Fuschia Print frames have gray polarized lenses; both cut 85% of visible light. Grilamid frame material; custom metal logo plaques. Frames of the Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses feature lively prints and a stylish rivet detail.
short_description: Light as a butterfly and a little bit sassy, the women's Suncloud Flutter Polarized Sunglasses are full of fun for all your outdoor exploits this summer.
